page.title: 08HOME LIFE _FARMER'S WIFE
page.content: 7.3O A.M.COOK BREAKFAST FOR FAMILY & PAYING GUESTS,CEREALS,BACON,EGGS, TEA, TOAST,COFFEE.8.2O A.M. 2 CHILDREN LEAVE FOR SCHOOL AT PRESTEIGNE. 9.OO A.M. 1 CHILD TO NEW RADNOR SCHOOL, WASH UP,FEED ANIMALS,FEED PETS & DUCKS 1O.A.M.WASH CLOTHES,HANG OUTSIDE. 1O.3O.A.M.COFFEE,HOUSEWORK,MAKE BEDS, CLEAN GUEST ROOMS.1.O.P.M. HUSBAND COMES IN FOR DINNER-SANDWICHES,TEA, CAKE,FRUIT.WASH UP.1.3O.P.M.BAKING, IRONING,PREPARE GUESTS TEA,ROAST MEAT, VEGETABLES.3.3OP.M.COLLECT SON FROM SCHOOL,BUY GROCERIES & MILK AT SHOP. 4.3O.P.M.CUP OF TEA,CAKE.CHILDREN ARRIVE HOME FROM SCHOOL & START HOME_ WORK.GARDENING_VEGETABLES & FLOWERS. 5.3O.P.M.FINISH PREPARATION OF GUESTS' TEA.7.O.P.M.SERVE GUESTS' TEA,3 COURSE MEAL,SOUP,ROAST,SWEET,TEA,COFFEE. PREPARE MEAL FOR FAMILY.WASH UP.FEED ANIMALS INCLUDING DOGS.9.OO CUP OF TEA
